tableSchema.table: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `lts_admin_job_tracker_monitor_data` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `gmt_created` bigint(20) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `job_tracker_identity` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `receive_job_num` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `push_job_num` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `exe_success_num` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `exe_failed_num` bigint(11) DEFAULT NULL, `exe_later_num` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `exe_exception_num` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `fix_executing_job_num` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `timestamp` bigint(20) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `max_memory` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `allocated_memory` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `free_memory` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `total_free_memory` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) );
